block.p: Allison Christiana Backus, a daughter of Theresa and Dennis Backus of Mill Neck, N.Y., was married yesterday to Michael H. Donnelly, a son of Theresa and Kenneth Donnelly of Toms River, N.J. The Rev. Bernadette M. Sullivan performed the ceremony at St. John's of Lattingtown Episcopal Church in Locust Valley, N.Y.

Mrs. Donnelly, who is known as Lissie, teaches in the nursery school at the Green Vale School in Glen Head, N.Y. She is also a portrait painter. She graduated cum laude from the Savannah College of Art and Design.

Allison Christiana Backus, a daughter of Theresa and Dennis Backus of Mill Neck, N.Y., was married yesterday to Michael H. Donnelly, a son of Theresa and Kenneth Donnelly of Toms River, N.J. The Rev. Bernadette M. Sullivan performed the ceremony at St. John's of Lattingtown Episcopal Church in Locust Valley, N.Y.

Mrs. Donnelly, who is known as Lissie, teaches in the nursery school at the Green Vale School in Glen Head, N.Y. She is also a portrait painter. She graduated cum laude from the Savannah College of Art and Design.

Mr. Donnelly, a lawyer, practices in New York. He graduated from the University of Maryland and received a law degree from Hofstra University and a master of laws degree in taxation from New York University.
